Trade/Device Name(s): Dexcom G6 Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) System
Dexcom G6 Glucose Program Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) System
Dexcom G6 Professional Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dexcom G6 Continuous Glucose Monitoring systems with updated adhesive patch for diabetes management in persons age 2+ years
Indications for Use Summary: Indicated for real-time continuous glucose monitoring for diabetes management in persons age 2+ years, replacing fingerstick blood glucose testing, aiding in detection of hyperglycemia/hypoglycemia, usable alone or with digitally connected devices including automated insulin dosing systems.
